definition: lit. not one drop of water can leak out/watertight/rigorous (argument)
a drop/to drip
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
(negative prefix)/not/no
to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)

sentences.english: I want to argue with him but his logic is way too tight.
sentences.chinese: 我想跟他辯，但他的邏輯是滴水不漏。

sentences.english: You know how we like to make our little boxes watertight.
sentences.chinese: 您知道，我們多希望我們的小盒子滴水不漏。

sentences.english: The Redskin defense isn't letting anything through today.
sentences.chinese: 紅人隊今天的防守是滴水不漏的。

sentences.english: I want to argue with him,but his logic is watertight.
sentences.chinese: 我想跟他辯，但他的邏輯是滴水不漏。

sentences.english: I intended to debate with him, but his arguments were so convincing.
sentences.chinese: 我想跟他辯，但他的邏輯是滴水不漏。

sentences.english: Both of them are so solid defensively.
I'll hoke up a good alibi.
sentences.chinese: 我會編一個滴水不漏的遁詞。

sentences.english: The newly-designed glue is waterproof and can bear endless heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 新型防水膠經得起連續的大雨沖刷，滴水不漏。

definition: lit. seamless heavenly clothes (idiom)/fig. flawless
(idiom) impossible to fault/impeccable
everything clear and orderly (idiom); neat and tidy
secure as a city protected by a wall of metal and a moat of boiling water (idiom)/well fortified/invulnerable to attack
(idiom) take care of everything; handle everything
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
lit. a needle concealed in silk floss (idiom)/fig. ruthless character behind a gentle appearance/a wolf in sheep's clothing/an iron fist in a velvet glove
not one drop of water leaks (idiom); fig. thoughtful and completely rigorous/watertight
calm/unruffled
surefire; absolutely safe (idiom)
lit. one strong beat and one weak beats in a measure of music (two beats in the bar) (idiom); fig. follow a prescribed pattern to the letter/scrupulous attention to detail
meticulous/thorough/comprehensive/complete/detailed
sealed off/impenetrable
handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
